body:
- Popular: shows the most often played decks.
- Favorite: shows decks manually tagged by player as a favorite deck.
- Recent: shows the most recently played decks.
- Random: lets you generate a random deck. Potentially quite complicated since you will probably want to define the set of cards on which to base the deck.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Additional deck groupings on Decks screen
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on July 28, 2014 19:39:35_

- Popular: shows the most often played decks.
- Favorite: shows decks manually tagged by player as a favorite deck.
- Recent: shows the most recently played decks.
- Random: lets you generate a random deck. Potentially quite complicated since you will probably want to define the set of cards on which to base the deck.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=633_
